Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic epistolary text: 33 ll. on recto and 12 ll. on verso. Complete, except for a small lacuna. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Letter from Hery-shy son of Hatre to Psenubaste. Date. year 20 Paophi 4(?) of unnamed King (Ptol. Philometor?, if so, BC. 161".
Curator's comments: Published Revillout, Corp.Pap II. pl. VII, and rev. cg. VI 6. Published by Depauw, The Demotic Letter (2006), 29 with bibliography.
Bibliographic references: Revillout 1888 / Papyrus Démotiques du British Museum, Premier Fascicule (p.4, pl.7)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (46664) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/46664)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Inlaid: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
